definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: There is a discrepancy in the combat log when casting Paladin healing spells.
sentences.chinese: 战斗记录当中对骑士的治疗记录有错误。

sentences.english: Full jolly knight he seemd, and faire did sith.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的骑士在马上英姿飒爽。

sentences.english: The paladin's number of spells per day does not increase after 20th level.
sentences.chinese: 圣骑士的每日施法数量不会在20级后继续增加。

sentences.english: Motorcyclists and bicyclists are often the victims in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 机车与脚踏车骑士常常是这种状况的牺牲者。

sentences.english: He turned back to the queen's knights.
sentences.chinese: 他回身转向王后的骑士。

sentences.english: The Round Table broke up following the death of Arthur.
sentences.chinese: 亚瑟死后，圆桌骑士各奔东西。

sentences.english: We are not impressed by sea cucumber chivalry。
sentences.chinese: 我们并不会被海参骑士精神所感动。

sentences.english: A hundred knights and a thousand soldiers escorted the Princess Helena.
sentences.chinese: 一百名骑士和一千名士兵为海伦纳公主保驾。

sentences.english: So what kind of an executive makes for an ideal white knight?
sentences.chinese: 那么，什么样的经理人才是理想的白衣骑士呢？

sentences.english: Smiling at the Dornish knights, she switched back to the Common Tongue.
sentences.chinese: 边对多恩骑士微笑，她边转换成通用语。

sentences.english: You tell the other clans to come. Tell them Toruk Makto calls to them!
sentences.chinese: 通知别的种族，通知他就说是魅影骑士在召唤他们。

sentences.english: In the castle he had a round table, where he sat with his knights.
sentences.chinese: 在城堡里他有一张圆桌，他和他的骑士们都坐在那里。
骑士们骑马比武，嬉戏作乐。

sentences.english: The Soviet knight is dying inside his armor.
sentences.chinese: 苏联骑士正在他的铠甲内死去。

sentences.english: I move my knight to protect my king.
sentences.chinese: 我移动了我的骑士来保护我的国王。

sentences.english: Knight system is rooted in the superstratum society of mid-century Europe.
sentences.chinese: 骑士制度产生于中世纪欧洲的上层社会。
